message:
- moved from json to sqlite
- rewrote everything
- (except the gui)
- put new preferences up
"everything should work" as in 0.1.5
follow the link to get releases i don't plan on releasing to the market, because i consider them too buggy. if you want to help out testing and debugging, you're welcome.
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/5043669/convorsation-test.apk
there is an issue with loading more topics
so will convorsation be released as open source some time? (:
it might happen ;)
@EisFrei Open source, please :) I would love to try out some Android development and forking Convorsation would be great way to do it

@jorilallo i don't know if it would be the smartest choice to use this as a starting point for android development, as this is my learning-android-app, too and i just know that a lot of beginner's mistakes were made and quite a few of those are still around...

http://dl.dropbox.com/u/5043669/convorsation-test.apk
new test version 0.2.0 pre 2:
- removing messages and topics live uppon deletion
- stars added/removed live
- fixed a crash that occured if you selected a topic via notification
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/5043669/convorsation-test.apk
give it a try. i think it's the most stable version until now *cough*
notifications will disappear if you read a topic on the website, so the taskbar will declutter if you browse. but i will need to figure out a way to group notifications using only one icon.
@justinlilly putting it on my list
feature request: mark group as read from long press on topic, group and mark all from menu on topic list page.

have you tried swype? it's way more easy than typing all those keys one after another http://swypeinc.com/
re. mark-as-read: thats what i understood ;)

so I'm clear (was on the phone which makes typing kind of a pain)... long click topic, mark topic as read. long click group, mark group as read. menu in topic list, mark group as read. menu in group list, mark all as read.
This one is in the app store but I want to test new versions for a short period before putting them up in the store
I don't really like downloading things that aren't in an appstore as I always forget to get updates.
(this app included ;)
0.2 will hit the market in the next days
Yea. I have the appstore version, so I'm going to follow that track :)

0.2.0 pre 3:
- added russian, thx to @dpwiz
- changed the inputtype to short_message, so smilie buttons are available
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/5043669/convorsation-test.apk
